title: Create a Free Fire India-style (original) mobile battle game and prepare for Google Play release

requirements.text: Replace any use of the name "Free Fire" / "Free Fire India" with an original game name and branding throughout the app (UI copy, metadata, docs) to avoid using third-party/trademarked IP; keep all user-facing text in English.

quotes: Create a free fire india and launch in play store

acceptanceCriteria: No UI text, document text, HTML title, or manifest fields contain "Free Fire" or "Free Fire India".
All user-facing text is in English.
An original app name and short name are used consistently across the UI and PWA metadata.

requirements.text: Update PWA/app identity metadata to match the new original game name, including: frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest (id/name/short_name/description/theme/background colors if needed) and frontend/index.html (title/meta description/theme-color/icons references).

quotes: Create a free fire india and launch in play store

acceptanceCriteria: manifest.webmanifest id is a valid slug (5â€“50 chars; letters/numbers/hyphens only) and matches the chosen app identifier across the project.
index.html title and meta description match the new game name and description.
The app still loads and is installable as a PWA in Chrome on Android (manifest detected, icons load).

requirements.text: Implement a simple, mobile-friendly "battle royale style" game loop (single-player) suitable for Android browsers: on-screen touch controls, a player character that moves/aims, enemies/bots that spawn, a safe non-graphic combat mechanic (e.g., tap-to-shoot or auto-shoot), health, score/kills, and clear Win/Lose conditions, with Start/Pause/Game Over flow preserved.

quotes: Create a free fire india and launch in play store

acceptanceCriteria: Game is playable end-to-end on mobile: Start -> Playing -> Pause/Resume -> Game Over/Win -> Restart.
Touch-first controls work in portrait and landscape.
Combat is non-graphic and appropriate for a broad audience (no gore).
HUD shows at minimum: health and score (or kills).
The game maintains stable performance on mid-range Android devices (no obvious runaway spawning or UI freezing during a 2-minute run).

requirements.text: Replace the current construction-truck gameplay UI assets usage in the game scene with new, original battle-game art assets stored as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated, and wire them into the new game (do not serve images from the backend).

quotes: Create a free fire india and launch in play store

acceptanceCriteria: All new images are located under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced via /assets/generated/... paths.
No image assets are served or fetched from the Motoko backend.
The game does not reference construction-specific generated images for its primary gameplay visuals.

requirements.text: Update Google Play publishing documentation (frontend/docs/PLAY_STORE_PUBLISHING.md) so it reflects the new original game name, identifier, and required listing assets/screenshots for the new game.

quotes: Create a free fire india and launch in play store

acceptanceCriteria: The doc no longer refers to "Construction Rush" or construction-specific identifiers.
The doc includes the updated App ID/slug and describes the same TWA-based Play Store flow for this app.
The doc lists the new required Play Store assets (icon, feature graphic, screenshots) using the new filenames produced in this change request.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor; do not introduce additional backend services.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose them instead.
Do not use "Free Fire" / "Free Fire India" branding or any third-party copyrighted/trademarked characters, logos, or names in the app, metadata, or assets.
Do not add real-time multiplayer (no WebSockets / socket.io).
nonGoals: Actually submitting the app to the Google Play Console on the user's behalf (upload/review/payment steps remain manual).
Implementing a full 3D shooter with networked multiplayer or advanced physics.

required: Original game app icon with bold emblem-style mark (battle-app-icon.dim_512x512.png)
Original game app icon small variant (battle-app-icon-small.dim_192x192.png)
Simple non-graphic projectile or muzzle-flash effect sprite (projectile-effect.dim_256x256.png)
